item.title: A Match Made In Heaven
item.description: [[songs/c/counterparts/prophets/the_sanctuary.md#we-are-now-rooted-in-the-ground-that-we-were-born-into-vyl-wnanory|Tell me was it all worth it to watch your kingdom grow?]] [[songs/c/counterparts/prophets/the_sanctuary.md#we-are-now-rooted-in-the-ground-that-we-were-born-into-vyl-wnanory|All the anchors in the ocean haven’t sunk this low]] [[songs/c/counterparts/prophets/the_sanctuary.

item.title: All Love is Lost
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/hybrid_theory/a_place_for_my_head.md#i-want-to-be-in-another-place-vyl-wnanory|The workers all march to the beat of the drum]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/hybrid_theory/a_place_for_my_head.md#i-want-to-be-in-another-place-vyl-wnanory|Their spirits are broken, they have nowhere to run]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/hybrid_theory/a_place_for_my_head.

item.title: Alpha Omega

item.title: Always
item.description: [[songs/e/emarosa/versus/same_tight_rope.md#when-all-is-said-and-done-vyl-wnanory|If only you were here to hold my head above bloody waters]] [[songs/e/emarosa/versus/same_tight_rope.md#when-all-is-said-and-done-vyl-wnanory|We could make it through]] [[songs/e/emarosa/versus/same_tight_rope.md#when-all-is-said-and-done-vyl-wnanory|You turned your back on me and now I do the same to you]] [[songs/e/emarosa/versus/same_tight_rope.

item.title: Broken Cross
item.description: [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.md#what-will-it-take-for-you-to-notice-vyl-wnanory|God only knows why we were born to burn, uh]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/stan.md#and-when-you-dream-i-hope-you-cant-sleep-and-you-scream-about-it-vyl-wnanory|If God is my witness, He’ll see that all is not well]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/stan.

item.title: C.A.N.C.E.R
item.description: [[songs/t/the_who/whos_next/behind_blue_eyes.md#no-one-knows-what-its-like-vyl-wnanory|No one knows permanence quite like you]] [[songs/t/the_who/whos_next/behind_blue_eyes.md#no-one-knows-what-its-like-vyl-wnanory|There’s a ruthlessness in all that you do]] [[songs/t/the_who/whos_next/behind_blue_eyes.md#no-one-knows-what-its-like-vyl-wnanory|This is not about what we deserve]] [[songs/t/the_who/whos_next/behind_blue_eyes.

item.title: Devil’s Island
item.description: [[songs/e/enter_shikari/the_mindsweep/the_appeal__the_mindsweep_ii.md#eugh-vyl-wnanory|This is your country, this is your home,]] [[songs/e/enter_shikari/the_mindsweep/the_appeal__the_mindsweep_ii.md#eugh-vyl-wnanory|Here is the house where you grew up alone.]] This is your country, this is your home, Here is the house where you grew up alone.

item.title: Downfall
item.description: [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/devils_island.md#this-is-your-country-this-is-your-home-vyl-wnanory|They want all for one and none for all]] [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/devils_island.md#this-is-your-country-this-is-your-home-vyl-wnanory|I want to be there to witness the downfall]] [[songs/a/as_i_lay_dying/shadows_are_security/repeating_yesterday.

item.title: From The Wilderness
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#i-remember-jumping-off-of-cliff-tops-vyl-wnanory|There is no end game]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#i-remember-jumping-off-of-cliff-tops-vyl-wnanory|So whisper the truth and pass on the blame]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.md#i-remember-jumping-off-of-cliff-tops-vyl-wnanory|Just put us out of our misery, this defeat is a victory]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_remember.

item.title: The Empty Hourglass

Because I can’t forget]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/nomadic.md#inside-all-my-flaws-again-i-cant-let-go-vyl-wnanory|The saddest story of all that ever was]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/nomadic.

item.title: We’re All Alone
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#i-watch-them-all-come-gotta-watch-the-rest-go-vyl-wnanory|I am your hero]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#i-watch-them-all-come-gotta-watch-the-rest-go-vyl-wnanory|Still I sleep alone at night]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#i-watch-them-all-come-gotta-watch-the-rest-go-vyl-wnanory|In years you’ll thank me]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.md#i-watch-them-all-come-gotta-watch-the-rest-go-vyl-wnanory|For getting everything right]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/notes_from_the_underground/we_are.
